titles.title: To clear certain impediments to the licensing of the vessel PLAY PRETTY for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Referred to the Subcommittee On Merchant Marine.

committee.name: House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries
House Committee on Merchant Marine and Fisheries

action.text: Text of Measure Incorporated into H.R.2150.

bill.summary: 2/18/1993--Introduced. Authorizes the Secretary of the department in which the Coast Guard is operating to issue a certificate of documentation for a named vessel for employment in the coastwise trade of the United States.
